thread.title: ORock Technologies Names Dale Stucke as Chief Financial Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: ORock Technologies Names Dale Stucke as Chief Financial Officer
text:
RESTON, Va., March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- ORock ® Technologies , Inc., announced today that Dale Stucke has joined its executive leadership team in the role of Chief Financial Officer. Stucke is responsible for all financial, accounting, and audit matters for the company. ORock is a small business Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and cloud service provider (CSP) serving enterprise customers in defense, government, and highly-regulated commercial markets.
Stucke brings to ORock more than 35 years of financial management expertise within the IT services community. His career includes executive positions with multiple technology and consulting firms. Most recently, he served as CFO for IT services company Constellation West, with responsibility for operations, financial reporting, treasury, financial planning and forecasting, human resources, and security.
Previously, Stucke was VP Finance of USIS Corporation, a $600 million services organization, with responsibility over corporate financial planning and forecasting, financial reporting, contract administration, pricing, and compliance. He also served as VP, Finance and Corporate Controller of GTSI Corporation, a publicly-traded government contractor, with oversight over internal management reporting CAS and FAR compliance, forecasting, and financial reporting. Prior positions include internal audit, finance, and operations roles with Unisys Corporation, BearingPoint, Inc., General Dynamics, and Booz Allen Hamilton.
Dale received a Bachelors of Business Administration in Finance from the University of Cincinnati and an MBA from Wright State University. He is a licensed CPA in the State of Virginia.
"Dale brings to ORock an ideal mix of financial acumen and federal government services experience," said Gregory Hrncir, Co-Founder & CEO of ORock. "We're excited to have Dale's financial expertise as we enter a critical growth phase."
For more information about ORock Technologies, visit orocktech.com
About ORock Technologies
ORock ® Technologies is a small business IaaS and cloud service provider serving enterprise customers in defense, government, and highly-regulated commercial markets — organizations with the most stringent requirements for security, compliance, and control. A Red Hat Certified Cloud and Service Provider (CCSP), ORock operates a private, encrypted, carrier-grade fiber optic network and a "pure-play" Red Hat open source cloud to maximize performance and flexibility while protecting the most sensitive data and workloads. ORock solutions enable: secure cloud and IaaS; secure application hosting and migration; federal authorization services; and secure connectivity and mobility.
